title: Ticket #4840: Improve and simplify lib_auth_protocol-ssl test
description:
We have been using pre-generated certs and other keys for which has always caused issues when they expired. But the test proved broken on RH7. So now we generate what we need on the fly and we can remove 5 files from the test because we are down to one file now.

We still want to get it to work on windows if we can

One of the 5 files is used by the gsi test which is also down to one file. However we need some additional settings in order to use ssl to be self signing for GSI requirements.

Once both of these work we will verify removal of the 9 files.
